significant_changes: Values exceeded upper reference range starting from May 2024
Return Data.analysis_summary: Strong upward trend detected in Fasting Glucose levels over 6-month period. Values have progressively increased from 85.2 mg/dL to 110.2 mg/dL, representing a 29.4% increase. Patient has exceeded normal reference range (70-100 mg/dL) in recent months, indicating potential glucose metabolism concerns.
risk_indicators: Consistent upward glucose trend suggests developing glucose intolerance
Recent values above normal range warrant clinical attention
Progressive increase pattern indicates need for diabetes screening
